profileAlternative.summary: Actively seeking a software engineering internship. positions.title: Research Assistant
positions.description:
Currently designing data structures and algorithms that speed up Deep Learning vector operations
in C++. This optimization will improve performance and reduce the power consumption of the current version. Planning to propose my case study as a research paper.

positions.title: Software Development Intern
positions.description: Engineered an Android application for home surveillance and monitoring system which is controlled by Raspberry Pi. I was working on an Android application. Utilized agile methodology for rapid software development. Write automated tests to validate code correctness.

positions.title: Software Development Intern
positions.description: Developed an Android application for a Non-Profit Organization. I designed some templates and its internal working in java. Monitored errors and defects. Participate in code reviews.
